You enter the %1$s. There is a long hallway and at the end of it you find two doors: a &font_red;red door &font_end;and a &font_blue;blue door&font_end;. Which one do you open?

You continue through a long hallway and at the end you find a lever. It seems you can switch it to the &font_cyan;right &font_end;or to the &font_cyan;left&font_end;. Which direction do you switch it?
You find a big room full of old furniture and dust. You look around and at the further wall you see two buttons. Which one do you press?
Oh! You are suddenly falling down through what seems to be a spiral slide…
You finally fall in a small room with nothing else but a small &font_wood;wooden chest&font_end;. Open it?
You open the &font_wood;wooden chest &font_end;and find &font_gold;%1$d gold&font_end;!
After celebrating the findings, you see a window that seems to strangely connect to the outside of the temple. (How is that even possible? You were falling down through that spiral slide!)
You jump outside the temple through the window and realise the entrance is suddenly blocked by some rocks. Better leave that temple alone.

You decide to not open the &font_wood;wooden chest&font_end;. You find a window that seems to strangely connect to the outside of the temple. (How is that even possible? You were falling down through that spiral slide!)
You jump outside the temple through the window and realise the entrance is suddenly blocked by some rocks. Better leave that temple alone.
After pushing the second button, something hits your head and you lose your consciousness.
You open your eyes outside of the temple. You realise there are rocks blocking where the entrance was.
As soon as you move the lever, a secret wall is opened and you walk through it. Behind it there\'s a &font_gold;golden chest&font_end;! Open it?
You try to open the &font_gold;golden chest &font_end;but as soon as you touch it, you feel an electric shock and lose consciousness.
You open your eyes outside of the temple. You realise there are just rocks blocking where the entrance was.
You decide to not open the chest and realise next to the wall there\'s a door. You open it and see there\'s light at the end of the path.
As soon as you walk outside, a group of rocks fall and block the entrance.
As soon as you move the lever, a door is opened. You cross it. There\'s a short hallway and at the end of it there are two paths: one seems darker than the other. Which one do you take?
You go through the darker path and continue walking for a while until you find a wall. When you turn around to go back to where you came from, there\'s a new wall.
You are trapped. After being lost for a long time, you lose your consciousness…
You open your eyes outside of the temple. You realise there are rocks blocking where the entrance was.
You follow the normal path for a while until you find a wall with a suspicious &font_red;torch&font_end;. What do you do, &font_cyan;pull it &font_end;or &font_cyan;turn it &font_end;to the side?
Suddenly, the walls around you are transformed and a big and golden room appears. There is a &font_silver;silver chest &font_end;in the middle of the room. Do you open it?
You open the &font_silver;silver chest&font_end;! There\'s &font_gold;%1$d gold &font_end;and a %2$s! You take it and suddenly, a mysterious gas comes out and you lose your consciousness…
You open your eyes outside of the temple. You realise there are rocks blocking where the entrance was.
After deciding to not open the chest, an unknown deep voice says: \'After reaching so far and surviving all the dangers, you are not opening the chest? Your punishment will be a fight against me!\'

They are the most adaptable and flexible of the common races. Their alignment resides in the fine line between good and evil. They are balanced in fighting and magic and have an innate knowledge of crafting, and are natural explorers.

They used to live under the mountains just caring about their mines and beers, but due to the recent spreading of evil in the world, many have started to explore the world to live their own legends like their ancestors did in the past. They are one of the strongest races, having great mining skills, and they are the only ones capable of crafting Beer.

Even though they have appeared on books and stories, almost no one has seen one in their life, as Halflings are peaceful people who live in their own hidden villages, cooking, eating, reading about stories from the first era, and living all kinds of fantasy in their minds. Since evil has started spreading around the world, some of the most brave Halfling have started their own adventures like the ones they read on their books.

They take delight in life, enjoying every moment of invention, exploration and investigation. They used to be focused just on their inventions, and exploration, but recently many brave Gnomes have been seen adventuring around the world.

Elves are magical people of otherworldly grace, living in the world but not entirely part of it. Selfish and egocentric, they are worried about their future due to the increased presence of evil, so they have started to become more present in the world in search for their salvation.

Generally known as the evil version of the regular elves. They are extremely intelligent, charismatic and dexterous, but share surface elves\' comparative frailty and slight frames. They are characterized by white or silver hair and obsidian black skin.

Once living humans brought to life in a horrifying state of undeath through the practice of necromantic magic. They have great strength and intelligence but lack of speed. Their hunger increases faster than the other races, but they can eat corpses to restore Mana, Hunger, and Health.

Bestial and savage, orcs band together as trıbes, living on hunting and raiding. As lovers of war, they have found a great enemy in the evil that has recently spread around the world. They have started to relate to other races with whom they had only spoken in the language of weapons and magic not so long ago.

They are semi-aquatic reptilian humanoids. Their skin was covered in scales and varied in color from dark green through to shades of brown and gray. The most brave of them have been travelling around the world, finding other places to expand their lifes and be able to help in the destruction of evil.
A strange being who no one has ever seen before. Balanced, smart, and able to adapt to any situation, their purpose in life is a mystery.
Can see the surrounding tiles when moving around, making it easier to explore.

&font_food;Foodie&font_end;: Increased max. hunger, allowing to resist longer without eating.&br;&br;&font_food;Gourmet&font_end;: Increases the hunger restored when eating.&br;&br;&font_cyan;Discrete&font_end;: Reduces the probability of being attacked by a &font_red;Monster &font_end;by &font_cyan;33&font_end;%.

&font_wood;Gnomic Space&font_end;: Increases the inventory size by &font_cyan;10&font_end;.&br;&br;&font_bomb;Bomber&font_end;: Starts with some &font_gunpowder;Gunpowder&font_end;, various &font_bomb;Bombs &font_end;and knowing how to craft them.&br;&br;&font_cyan;Perceptive&font_end;: Detects when there\'s something hidden, so you can &font_cyan;Search &font_end;to find it.

&font_portal;Teleport&font_end;: Can &font_portal;teleport &font_end;to a random location in the island.&br;&br;&font_mana;Mana Flow&font_end;: Regenerates &font_cyan;1% &font_end;&font_mana;mana &font_end;every turn if &font_health;health &font_end;is over &font_cyan;50%&font_end;.&br;&br;&font_mana;Elven Magic&font_end;: Have extra &font_mana;mana &font_end;(&font_cyan;+25&font_end;).

&font_green;Weather Immunity&font_end;: Immune to &font_red;Hot &font_end;or &font_tundra;Cold &font_end;damage.&br;&br;&font_health;Unbreakable&font_end;: If a &font_red;Monster&font_end;\'s attack would kill you, you resist it and survive with &font_health;1 &font_end;health point.&br;&br;&font_hunger;Undead Hunger&font_end;: &font_hunger;Hunger &font_end;increases faster, but can eat from corpses to restore &font_hunger;Hunger&font_end;, &font_health;Health &font_end;and &font_mana;Mana&font_end;.

&font_dark_green;Tough Skin&font_end;: &font_cyan;5%&font_end; damage reduction in combat.&br;&br;&font_attack;Berserk&font_end;: In combat, using the "Attack" command increases a &font_cyan;10% &font_end;the damage each turn.
